50.movie_plot: Doctors Herbert West and Dan Cain discover the secret to creating human life and proceed to create a perfect woman from dead tissue.

40.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

44.movie_plot: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

47.movie_plot: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

41.movie_name: Seven Samurai (The Magnificent Seven) (Shichinin no samurai) (1954)
41.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

43.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

51.movie_plot: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

45.movie_plot: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

49.movie_plot: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

52.movie_plot: Since the earliest days in her childhood Lara has had a difficult but important task. Both her parents are deaf-mute and Lara has to translate from sign-language to the spoken word and vice...

46.movie_plot: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

42.movie_plot: Two friends who have gone too long without sex set out to get some.

48.movie_plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

1.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

6.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
6.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

4.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
4.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

20.movie_plot: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

33.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

19.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

16.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

25.movie_plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

29.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

5.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
5.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

14.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
14.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

2.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

21.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

15.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

24.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

8.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

9.movie_plot: Bonnie Parker, a bored waitress falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, robbing cars and banks.

12.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

26.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
26.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

18.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

39.movie_plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

35.movie_plot: In 1950s England, professor Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

10.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
10.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

22.movie_plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

7.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

30.movie_plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

3.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

32.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

28.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

31.movie_plot: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

34.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

27.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

23.movie_plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

0.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

11.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

36.movie_plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

37.movie_plot: A crew in Antarctica finds a neighboring camp destroyed and its crew dead. Whatever killed them is nowhere to be found, unless it's hidden in plain sight.

17.movie_plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to the mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

38.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

13.movie_plot: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.
